summary: A productivity/game-style app with a Command Center page featuring hunter rank progression based on player level.
architectural_notes: Command Center page displays hunter rank based on player level using defined rank thresholds

existing_features.title: Update the rank progression thresholds in `frontend/src/utils/rankUtils.ts` to use the new level ranges: E Rank Hunter (Lvl 1–5), D Rank Hunter (Lvl 5–10), C Rank Hunter (Lvl 10–15), B Rank Hunter (Lvl 15–20), A Rank Hunter (Lvl 20–30), S Rank Hunter (Lvl 30–40), SS Rank Hunter (Lvl 40–50), SSS Rank Hunter (Lvl 50–60), Shadow Monarch (Lvl 60+).

new_feature_requests.summary: Update rank thresholds on Command Center page: E(1-5), D(5-10), C(10-15), B(15-20), A(20-30), S(30-40), SS(40-50), SSS(50-60), Shadow Monarch(60+)

projectName: Update rank level thresholds in Command Center / Dashboard
